page.title: 15A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: On Monday, I got up at seven O'clock . After I had got dressed,I got my dorm up and they take about half an hour to get ready. At eight O'clock we go down to school for breakfast.We take about twenty minutes to have breakfast. The whole school has an English lesson followed by a Maths lesson.Then we have a twenty minutes for break. After break my group has Life Science for two lessons,then we have lunch. After lunch we have a Games lesson for one and a half hours followed by activities for an hour,then an hour of prep. After prep we have tea and then we go back to the Boarding Houses.Then we play out.
